name: Solitaire Pro - klondike game
description:
iPaciência has a simple and intuitive interface with a smart gameplay that provides a dynamic game experience even in portable devices.

Main features:

- The interface automatically adjusts for righties or lefties
- Big cards
- Card animations
- Universal app (iPhone and iPad)
- Unlimited undo steps
- Statistics
- Score (current and highest)
- Elapsed time (current and highest)
- Card sounds
- It’s possible to restart the game
- Game automatically saved when the app is closed
- Turn 1 or 3 cards
- Drag and drop
- Auto-move (with a single click)
- Different cards backs
